ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We are grateful to the land owner and the nature conservation department of Coesfeld district for support and our colleagues and trainees of the Echolot GbR as well as the NABU city association MÃ¼nster volunteers (voluntary ecological year) for help in the field. We also thank Toni Fleischer for the helpful comments on previous versions of the manuscript.
